definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: As I'm fired, I hope I can get a good recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我被解雇，但我希望能得到一份不错的推荐书。

sentences.english: Can you furnish a letter of recommendation from them?
sentences.chinese: 你能让他们给你准备一份推荐书吗？

sentences.english: Letter of Recommendation from the Thesis Advisor.
Get personal Store page with Testimonials, Books, Authors, etc…
sentences.chinese: 获取个人存储与推荐书，书籍，作者等网页。

sentences.english: A good countenance is a letter of recommendation .
sentences.chinese: 一副善良的相貌是一封推荐书。

sentences.english: He has a good reference from his former employer.
sentences.chinese: 他有以前老板提供的一份很好的推荐书。

sentences.english: Today I am going to look for work, can you write me a recommendation?
sentences.chinese: 我今天要去找工作，你能帮我写一份推荐书吗？

sentences.english: Requests for character references are all too often answered evasively.
sentences.chinese: 对品行推荐书的要求时常会得到含糊其辞的回答。

sentences.english: Recommendation Letter from the Thesis Advisor.
The nominator should deliver a completed Nomination Form, with an attached Recommendation to Hong Kong Print Awards.
sentences.chinese: 提名人除了需要填妥参加表格外，并须提交推荐书。

definition: impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to read a sample chapter of a book/to subscribe to a publication on a trial basis/to attend classes on a trial basis
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
